meanings.definition: A temporary position in a company for a student or recent graduate to gain work experience.
meanings.sent1: Many students apply for internships during the summer to learn about different careers.
meanings.sent2: She completed three internships at various companies before landing a full-time job.
meanings.sent3: The internships were like a sneak peek into the professional world.
meanings.sent4: His internships were stepping stones to his dream career.
meanings.sent5: The internships provided valuable hands-on experience for the students.

meanings.definition: The period of time during which someone works as an intern.
meanings.sent1: During her internships, she learned a lot about the industry.
meanings.sent2: The internships lasted for three months each.
meanings.sent3: His internships seemed to fly by in a whirlwind of new experiences.
meanings.sent4: The internships marked the beginning of her professional journey.
meanings.sent5: The internships were like chapters in a book, each adding to the story of her career.
